metadata.title: CVE-2016-7948 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
X.org libXrandr before 1.5.1 allows remote X servers to triggerout-of-bounds write operations by leveraging mishandling of reply data.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7948` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxrandr2 - 2:1.5.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxrandr package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.5.1-1').
